features: 🌈【Easy to Wring Mop】Mops with wringer removes water from the mop head while keeping your hands dry. Perfect for controlling water use.

💛【Microfiber & Scrub pad】This dry & wet mops for hardwood possesses excellent water absorption, when you clean the floor with no excess dripping, catch dust, hair and dirt tightly, Scrub pad for the mop head helps remove stubborn stains on floors for a superior clean.

🌈【Long Handle Twist Mop】Twist mops for floor cleaning heavy duty is 57" long, longer than regular mops, no need to bend over. Soft and comfortable foam handle, more comfortable to hold. loop on end of handle makes it easy to hang.
💛【Minimize Tangling】Microfiber twist mop head has double tail bands and looped ends to minimize tangling.

🌈【Widely Used Mop】Great for cleaning all types of floors, such as wooden floors, laminate, bamboo, hardwood, tile and marble. This mop is suitable for use in commercial, household, office, and industrial applications.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Self-Wringing Twist Mop This self-wringing twist mop uses a ratchet in the handle to twist and wring water out of the mop head. Wet mops for floor cleaning with wringer, make your hands will never touch the water. If you are floor cleaning with a mop and do not want to touch dirty water, KeFanta twist mops will be your best choice.
Hang-up design The hook can hang the mop on the wall to save space and drain the water of the mop microfiber mop head for easy removal. You can found Replacement mop heads in our store.

Tailbands Prevent Tangling Three tailbands--at the top and bottom of the mop head--reduces messy tangling, after squeezing, hold the point of swivel joint and push forwards gently, then you can use it. Scrubbing pad on mop head When you encounter stubborn elements in the process of cleaning the floor, scrubbing pad on mop head top help remove stubborn stains on floors. Super-strong adsorptive force Microfiber twist mop possesses super-strong adsorptive force can catch dust, hair and dirt tightly, make floor cleaning more easy and simple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Mop Actually Works
reviews.reviewText: Okay, I have been beyond frustrated with mops lately. I tried the Swiffer mop - NO! I tried the O'Cedar wring mop - NO! it broke on the very first use. In the past I have tried other mops and they all failed me. This mop actually worked!It is easy to put together. It has a ratcheting system to help wring the the mop out better than other simple twist mops. You can shake the mop head down a few times if you need to (I don't know why you would do this but it was very important for some friends who also tried this mop out) with no issues or loosening. It makes a nice poof of fabric/strings (?) with its mop head when you mop, so you don't have to worry about the strings separating and scratching the floor. The little scrubbing dot on the tip is sewn on and can take some fairly vigorous scrubbing. The metal tubes that make up the handle are much stronger than the O'Cedar mop or Swiffer. The tubes screw together rather than just push together.It really is a great mop. It wrings out very well without having to use your hands - at all. Fits nicely in a 10 quart cheap bucket from Walmart. I want to add, by friend request, it cleans baseboards and walls nicely when damp. Finally, I really appreciate the longer handle. It makes reaching the bathroom ceiling much easier (I'm 5'4") for cleaning.I also want to add, this is a real review. I am not just giving this to get some free junk item for posting a positive review. It took me way too long to find a mop I could actually use and feel like it does a great job. I just wanted to share this is a good mop at a fair price. I say, "Buy this one! It does what it says on the tin."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple Mop Does the Job
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to use and easy to put together. Strong enough for what I need it for, others mentioned it felt flimsy, but it's fine for normal use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, inexpensive mop
reviews.reviewText: Great and inexpensive mop! Has a little scrubber for tough spots and is very absorbent to not only wash but dry up excess moisture post washing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bought twice, broken twice
reviews.reviewText: Great mop, very easy to assemble and use. Love the self wringing feature. Except twice now the plastic holding the mop to the handle broke (it looks like a zip tie?), so then the entire mop head comes loose from the twisty part. It's still attached to the handle, but you can nob longer wring it dry. I would buy it again since it's so cheap but really wish it would last longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I have this mop & like real well. Can't figure out how to get the head off to wash it. The one end comes off easy, but where attached to the yellow part can't figure it out. Help Any ideas?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use and clean picks up just fine
reviews.reviewText: easy to use and clean picks up just fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars OK, but a bit flimsy and tough to wring
reviews.reviewText: This mop is pretty good at cleaning, but the handle is very thin and comes in several pieces which sometimes separate in use.The wringing feature is a bit tough to use, as well, as the yarn of the mop head can tangle up, making it difficult to get fully wrung out.I also should add that in typical Amazon fashion, the sellers include a Photoshopped image of it in "action" (the one with the lady's feet,) that makes the item look MUCH bigger than it actually is. In reality, the head is at best halfhe size of what it looks like in that photo, and the handle significantly thinner. .
Je ne l'ai pas utilisé énormément mais j'adore le principe. Enfin j'ai l'impression de ne pas ressalir le sol et le tourner est super satisfaisant.

reviews.reviewTitle: Self-Wringing Twist Mop Not Easy to Use.
reviews.reviewText: This mop is not easy to lock and twist. Not recommended for people who have arthritis or other hand/arm ailments.
Waste of money water on the floor doesn't clean up completely even after multiple times of cleaning and there will be water spots after dry on floor. Product won't work same as shown in the video
